title: Emerald Marquise and Diamond Gold Bangles - Traditional Kanganalu
materials: 22K Gold; Marquise Cut Emeralds of exceptional green hue; Sparkling White Diamonds (SI Clarity
G Color); Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Elegant alternating marquise-cut emeralds and diamond clusters create a striking visual rhythm. The sleek and contemporary design showcases the vibrant color of the emeralds and the brilliance of the diamonds. Designed for comfort and style.
occasions: or adding a touch of regal elegance to everyday wear. Ideal for gifting during events like Seemantham.
description: A contemporary take on traditional South Indian bangles. The high-quality emeralds and diamonds make it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and finished with a Hyderabadi polish for enduring brilliance.
